TopicTitle: From now on, NO announcement of update dates

Articles.Content: Look what it's doing to the forum and some members' nerves.

Yeah, but it also helps us spot some fresh impatient idiots. Mildly entertaining if you ask me.

But on a serious note, you're right. Let it be a surprise.
they did not announce that .22 is coming out today, KSP weekly posted a date under a video which for all we know was a bad joke

they did not announce that .22 is coming out today, KSP weekly posted a date under a video which for all we know was a bad joke

It was confirmed by a helper and a tester.
I think they will never ever give any date or hint to date.

There is no situation that makes everyone happy unfortunately..

If no announcement is made, then the forums fill up with complaints about that after the release. Such is life.
